detail_desc: Ankle boots in imitation leather with studs, open sides, an adjustable tab with elastication and a metal fastener, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.

Rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Long kimono in satin with lace embroidery, dropped shoulders and wide, short sleeves. Narrow ties on the inside and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Loafers in shiny imitation leather with a fringed strap across the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Poncho in woven fabric with a fringed hem. Width 135 cm, length at the back 78 cm.

Hat in a printed weave with reflective details, a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Lining in faux fur and fleece.

Sleeveless body in pleated, shimmering jersey with a V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck, gentle gathers at the shoulders and a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch. Lined front.

Sleeveless body in pleated, shimmering jersey with a V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck, gentle gathers at the shoulders and a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch. Lined front.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Bootees in a soft cotton knit with embroidery and appliqués at the top and a high foldover shaft in jersey. Jersey lining. Soft soles.
Swimsuit with shimmering gold-coloured print, frills at the top and glittery elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined front and crotch.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with an opening and press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Skirt in patterned, washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Slim-fit, 5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, an embroidered motif on one leg and narrow hems.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a shirt front, collar, sewn-on bow tie, button placket, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
